company_commercial_names: s&l ducting | s&l ducting and contract services
short_description: s&l ducting is an industrial air solutions company based in united kingdom.
long_description: s&l ducting and contract services has the capacity to offer the supply and installation of galvanised, and stainless steel ductwork. as a business, we have experience from suppling large companies as well as medium sized and smaller businesses in the commercial and industrial sectors. with over 30 years experience we use the perfect blend of progressive extraction technology and attention to the needs of you, our customer to deliver the most efficient and effective industrial ventilation solutions. from ventilation systems to waste extraction our work is covered to the highest of standards and we have a vast number of suppliers at our disposal and we cover all areas of the uk. our systems include large dust booths and cyclones and small dust bag filters. some of our industries and sectors include woodworking, general manufacturing, recycling, and metal machining,.
business_tags: industrial ventilation | dust extraction | duct system | ventilation systems | bags & filters | ducting solutions | vehicle exhaust | filtration solutions | duct work | stainless steel | drying filters | supply & install | welding | wood works | metal machining | home server | paper & plastic | contracting services
generated_description: s&l ducting and contract services is a company specializing in the supply and installation of galvanized and stainless steel ductwork. with over 30 years of experience, the company provides high-quality dust extraction and industrial ventilation solutions. they cater to a wide range of industries, including woodworking, general manufacturing, recycling, and metal machining. their services encompass various types of ducting systems, such as kwik-fix clip, spiral, rectangular, and roll-top, as well as large dust booths, cyclones, and small dust bag filters. additionally, they offer industrial spray booth extractor systems, water wash spray extraction booths, paint extractor fans, dry back spray booths, powder booths, dry filtered booths, and wet filtered booths.
